resource.title: Cash-on-Arrival Reconciliation Sheet
resource.description: Printable ledger and spreadsheet for managing "Pay at Hotel" bookings, including forex buffers and audit trails for cash collection.
resource.painPoint: Agoda/Booking in Asia often default to "Pay at Hotel." Hosts become money changers, facing risks of theft, calculation errors, or receiving foreign currency.
keyFeatures: Forex Buffer: Calculator for accepting USD/EUR with a buffer for exchange costs
Audit Trail: Fields for "Expected Amount (Local)" vs "Collected Amount" + Staff Signature
No-Show Tracker: Flagging uncollected payments to reclaim commissions from OTAs
